Scripts.OnLoad: getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText("Hide keybindings"); this.tooltipText="Hide the keybindings in the item icons.";
getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText("Smart Selfcast"); this.tooltipText="Use 'smart selfcast' for targetable beneficial items.";
getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText("Show empty buttons"); this.tooltipText="Empty buttons will not be skipped.";
getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText("Scale Buttons"); this.tooltipText="Will scale AutoBar buttons in addition to the rest of your UI scaling. Set exact scaling to the right.";
getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText("Use MicroButton Aspect (1:2)"); this.tooltipText="Makes buttons look like 'MicroButtons' on the Main menu bar";
